Description:
A storybook inspired sanctuary of space
Peacefully secluded in the exclusive and enchanting Dunalister Park enclave on its own sizeable title, this exquisite storybook style home epitomises family harmony and charm. Immersed in glorious, vibrant Edna Walling gardens enticing birdlife that elevate the beauty of the large near-half acre allotment.
Stunning Queensland spotted gum floorboards transport you around a sun saturated architecturally designed floorplan primed for everyday living and entertaining. Cathedral ceilings, dormer windows reflecting blissful vistas and luxurious appointments create the perfect home sanctuary. An impressive living zone with bifolds and wood fired heater adjoins family/dining uniting with a high-end waterfall Caesarstone kitchen with spectacular aspect of the ranges, 900mm Delonghi oven incl 5 burner gas cooktop, Asko dishwasher and mosaic tiled splashback. Further enhanced by a butler's pantry and BI study nook. A separate refined formal living/sitting room is perfect for intimate occasions, extending outdoors to a wraparound merbau deck poised for summer BBQs and uninterrupted relaxation while the children explore the magnificently planted and whisper quiet surrounds. Boasting a majestic American redwood tree, crepe myrtles, heritage roses, fruit trees and a host of indigenous species.
Accommodating 5 charming bedrooms with leafy views, BIRs, 2 sophisticated fully tiled bathrooms plus a powder room. Master enjoys privacy and unsurpassed beauty on the ground floor with fitted WIR and ensuite with double basins. An upper rumpus/retreat is central to the children's domain and family bathroom with luxe bath and picture-perfect views of the Dandendong Ranges.
Set on a no through road, the home is merely minutes to Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, Oxley College, Good Shepherd Primary and Croydon Hills Primary. Close to McAdam Square delights, Chirnside Park and Eastland Shopping Centres. Great connections to Warrien Reserve, walking tracks, pocket parks, Croydon train station and freeway/Eastlink.
Delivering exceptional comfort with zoned ducted heating, refrigerated split systems throughout, ceiling fans, laundry, ample storage incl linen cupboard, understairs and attic and double remote garage with internal entry and rear garden access plus OSP.

Sprawling Tri-Level Serenity
Achieve the family dream of living a serene Warranwood lifestyle, with this sprawling tri-level home set on a scenic reserve-adjoining block.
Fabulously designed so everyone can enjoy their own space, the entry level comprises two robed bedrooms (one that could be used as a study), one bathroom plus a laundry that contains access to a dog run and a remote double garage with mezzanine storage.

The master suite with a walk-in wardrobe and en-suite is situated on this floor. Both rooms opening out onto an expansive partially-covered entertaining terrace with relaxing treetop vistas.
Downstairs, a rumpus room with games cupboard is flanked by a further two robed bedrooms and a third bathroom. Enjoying an effortless transition out to a paved courtyard with water feature and a lower-level lawn area with gated reserve access.
Enriched with quality extras, it features: gas ducted heating, split system air conditioning, a 3kw solar power system plus an abundance of storage.
Set in a tightly held neighbourhood, it accesses buses, trails, Warranwood Reserve and Primary School on foot. Is minutes from Melbourne Rudolf Steiner School, Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College, McAdam Square and North Ringwood shops. Only a short commute to Eastland and the EastLink freeway.
